00046 namespace loos {
00047 
00048   AtomicGroup createSystem(const std::string& s) {
00049 
00050     if (boost::iends_with(s, ".pdb")) {
00051       PDB pdb(s);
00052       return(pdb);
00053     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".psf")) {
00054       PSF psf(s);
00055       return(psf);
00056     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".prmtop")) {
00057       Amber amber(s);
00058       return(amber);
00059     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".xyz")) {
00060       TinkerXYZ tinkerxyz(s);
00061       return(tinkerxyz);
00062     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".gro")) {
00063       Gromacs gromacs(s);
00064       return(gromacs);
00065 
00066     } else
00067       throw(std::runtime_error("Error- cannot divine system file type from name '" + s + "'"));
00068   }
00069 
00070 
00071   pAtomicGroup createSystemPtr(const std::string& s) {
00072 
00073     pAtomicGroup pag;
00074 
00075     if (boost::iends_with(s, ".pdb")) {
00076       pPDB p(new PDB(s));
00077       pag = p;
00078     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".psf")) {
00079       pPSF p(new PSF(s));
00080       pag = p;
00081     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".prmtop")) {
00082       pAmber p(new Amber(s));
00083       pag = p;
00084     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".xyz")) {
00085       pTinkerXYZ p(new TinkerXYZ(s));
00086       pag = p;
00087     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".gro")) {
00088       pGromacs p(new Gromacs(s));
00089       pag = p;
00090 
00091     } else
00092       throw(std::runtime_error("Error- cannot divine system file type from name '" + s + "'"));
00093 
00094     return(pag);
00095   }
00096 
00097 
00098 
00099   pTraj createTrajectory(const std::string& s, const AtomicGroup& g) {
00100 
00101     if (boost::iends_with(s, ".dcd")) {
00102       pDCD pd(new DCD(s));
00103       pTraj pt(pd);
00104       return(pt);
00105     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".mdcrd")) {
00106       pAmberTraj pat(new AmberTraj(s, g.size()));
00107       pTraj pt(pat);
00108       return(pt);
00109     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".rst")
00110                || boost::iends_with(s, ".rst7")
00111                || boost::iends_with(s, ".inpcrd")) {
00112       pAmberRst par(new AmberRst(s, g.size()));
00113       pTraj pt(par);
00114       return(pt);
00115     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".pdb")) {
00116       pCCPDB ppdb(new CCPDB(s));
00117       pTraj pt(ppdb);
00118       return(pt);
00119     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".arc")) {
00120       pTinkerArc pta(new TinkerArc(s));
00121       pTraj pt(pta);
00122       return(pt);
00123     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".xtc")) {
00124       pXTC pxtc(new XTC(s));
00125       pTraj pt(pxtc);
00126       return(pt);
00127     } else if (boost::iends_with(s, ".trr")) {
00128       pTRR ptrr(new TRR(s));
00129       pTraj pt(ptrr);
00130       return(pt);
00131 
00132     } else
00133       throw(std::runtime_error("Error- cannot divine trajectory file type from name '" + s + "'"));
00134   }
00135 
00136 
00137 }
